text: Ebam kaâ€™bara jan'ye utsargikrta utake ami tomadera jan'ye allahara an'yatama nidarsana karechi. Ete tomadera jan'ye mangala rayeche. Sutaram saribad'dhabhabe bamdha abasthaya tadera yabeha karara samaya tomara allahara nama uccarana kara. Atahpara yakhana tara kata haye pare yaya takhana ta theke tomara ahara kara ebam ahara kara'o ye kichu yacna kare na take ebam ye yacna kare take. Emanibhabe ami eguloke tomadera basibhuta kare diyechi, yate tomara krtajnata prakasa kara.
